title: Ba Ke Yachi Shai Taiyang
synopsis: Tian Qi always bullies the short, fat, honest female colleague eggplant. Due to the size of the eggplant, it is difficult to find the Prince Charming in his heart. Tian Qi often makes suggestions for eggplant, but they are all bad ideas. Unexpectedly, after a collision of little things, Tian Qi and Eggplant found that they were the most important people in their hearts, and they performed a humorous story about their friends. (translated from baidu baike)
